question: Which nation houses "Banfora Cascades"?
explanation: The Cascades de Karfiguela, otherwise known as Banfora Cascades or Karfiguela Falls, are a series of waterfalls along the Komoe River in south-western Burkina Faso. It is one of the important tourist sites of Burkina Faso. It is also known as Tagbaladougou Falls or Banfora Falls.
